name: Bat Enchanter Witch
storyline: Every year in the witch kingdom there is a test so that they complete their studies and can use their powers wisely, but the test was very evil and one of the witches refused to do it. No one was against the Queen, everyone was afraid of her, as she was the most powerful witch in the kingdom, the Queen then went to the Witch and forced her to take the test again, as she is kind and animal-loving, she would never go wanting to hurt anyone, and being the Queen ordered her as a form of punishment that she never leave the castle. To get out she would need the help of her bats, she wanted to show the others that they didn't have to do everything the Queen ordered and that they had the right to choose to do good too.
summary: Take control of the witch Evelyn and escape the evil queen's castle by running, jumping and using magic to turn the bats into helpful allies.
